title: Realtor®

desciption: For experienced Realtor Hala Adra, real estate is about helping every client find their way home.Hala knows that buying or selling is a transformative life milestone, and one that’s often defined numerous complexities and challenges. That’s why she works tirelessly every day to be thetrusted advisor her clients deserve, one who can help them navigate every potential roadblockto make their dreams a reality. How?  combining unrivaled local insight, creative vision, andthe compassionate drive to make a difference in the lives of her clients. Forced to flee her homeland of Beirut in 1985, Hala knows all too well how intimidating it can beto start a new chapter. Luckily, she had traveled to DC once before, and sensed she couldenvision building a life here. Her instinct proved correct, and she has called our nation’s capitalhome ever since. After a stint working for the embassy of the U.A.E, Hala made the transition toreal estate at the behest of her brother, who knew what a valued resource she could be to anybuyer or seller thanks to her impressive business acumen, deep connections within the diplomatcommunity, and love of working with people. Hala made the , and instantly knew it was hercalling to help others find their place in the DC area just as she had found hers. Today, Hala is a reputable, award-winning Associate  who brings over 25 years ofindustry experience to each transaction. She’s best known  clients for her can-do attitude,world-class service approach, and inventive problem-solving skills. Whether she’s guiding first-time buyers or seasoned sellers, Hala is a dedicated advocate for every client, always workingto find the right solutions  putting their interests first. She also offers extensive insight into theentire DMV area—from the manicured sidewalks of McLean, to the bustling streets of DC, andthe scenic pathways of Bethesda. Hala is impressively well-traveled, and has participated in many local and international realestate conferences as part of her quest to be a lifelong learner. Such exposure has empoweredher to continually uncover inventive  angles for sellers, strategically positioning each in the light that will most effectively maximize its value. And as a multilingual Realtor withenduring international ties, Hala connects buyers from across the globe with sellers in the DCarea, turning every networking opportunity into a successful sale benefiting all parties involved. Hala has recorded $250 million in sales to date, and is consistently recognized Washingtonian as a top producer year after year. Although for Hala, the results she creates forher clients are the ones that matter most. It’s no surprise, then, that her business is 90% repeatand referral-based, or that she’s built a reputation as one of the most reliable, devoted Realtorsaround. When she’s not working for her clients, you can find Hala entertaining friends, gardening,decorating, and exploring the vibrant sights of the entire DMV Metro Area. She also lovestraveling, relaxing on the beach, listening to live music, and watching shows on Broadway.
title: Associate Broker  |  Realtor®

desciption: Listing Agent, Property Management, Landlord University of Maryland College Park, Criminology and Criminal Justice    Josh is a lifelong Maryland resident, originally from the Eastern Shore and attended the University of Maryland. Josh has lived in the DC area for 15 years. Licensed in Maryland and DC, Josh has been overseeing the maintenance and leasing of properties for over 8 years and has become one of the top rental listing agents in the area as a result of his strong work ethic, dedication to customer service and professionalism. In his earlier years, he spent time in the construction trades as a carpenter and involved in general contracting with historic and custom homes on the Eastern Shore, which gives him valuable insight on the needs and care of properties. Josh is an avid sports fan and memorabilia aficionado, and when he's not managing and renting properties he can be found cheering on the Terps, Orioles, and Ravens. Josh currently lives in Gaithersburg.

desciption: Carolyn is a second‐generation Realtor® who moved to the Washington area in 1998. Her passion  real estate was ignited at an early age—she grew up attending open houses and showings with her mom, where she witnessed first-hand just how meaningful it can be to help others find their place in the world. Prior to launching her own career in real estate, Carolyn was a teacher, counselor, and diplomat. Today, Carolyn leverages that background as she elevates the real estate process  both buyers and sellers alike. Carolyn's integrity, attention to detail, patience, and ability to negotiate make her an exceptional agent. Regardless of price point or location, Carolyn is a fierce advocate  her clients as she strives to bring their distinct vision to life.   Carolyn completed her undergraduate education at Vanderbilt University and holds Masters degrees from American University and the University of Virginia. Her hobbies include hiking, baking, reading, and spending time with her family.   AREAS SERVED: Northwest DC (Logan, Shaw, Dupont, Georgetown, Chevy Chase), Capitol Hill and the Waterfront, Northern Virginia (Arlington, Alexandria, Falls Church, Vienna/Oakton)
title: Realtor®

desciption: Buyer's Agent, Listing Agent, Short-Sale, Staging, Property Management   Maureen delivers. She explains markets, takes clients on driving tours, and shares stories about the community. Once you've found the perfect property, she'll work late hours to craft your best offer, closely managing the process through settlement.  When listing properties, she takes great care to field estimates for improvement work, hires professional photographers and cleaners, and provides staging services. She does comprehensive comparable sale studies to inform her clients' pricing strategies, helping sellers land in the sweet spot and solicit multiple offers and ideal terms. In addition to standard transactions, she's dealt in bank-owned properties, short sales, condos, coops, new builds, and flips, all while using her tactical contract writing. When she's not working, Maureen is a musician and educator. Through her creative career, Maureen became well versed in many communities in the area. She is sensitive to her clients' needs and is a calm and compassionate listener and teacher.  Maureen, a DC native, lives in Takoma, DC with her family. She's an active member of the Takoma Park community, teaching ukulele classes and hosting concerts in her home studio dubbed Takoma Ranch.
title: Realtor®

desciption: With a background in sales, real estate operations and interior design, Tess Amolsch has theideal experience and skills for a real estate agent. With 25 years of corporate sales experience,Tess learned the importance of listening to clients, understanding their needs and buildingtrust. After working in the corporate world, Tess became the director of operations forCompass DMV, where she developed a deep understanding of real estate listings, the contractsprocess and the benefits of Compass tools. After Covid, Tess moved into interior design anddiscovered she loves working in people’s homes. Real estate was the natural next step in hercareer. With an MBA from Johns Hopkins, Tess helps her clients navigate the sales process step by step, bringing an operational eye and keen organizational skills to every detail. With herexperience in interior design, she helps her clients see the vision and potential in each houseand understands what it takes to turn that house into a home. Tess lives in DC with herhusband, three children and dog, Pepper. In her spare time, she serves as deputy president ofMt. Pleasant Village, a nonprofit that helps seniors age in place.  Deeply committed to thecommunity she lives in, Tess also co-founded Neighbors Helping Neighbors during Covid to help provide food aid, Covid tests and masks to community members in need. Tess grew up inNorthern Virginia and has lived in DC since 1997. When she’s not watching her kids row crew or play field hockey, she is on a quest to find the best burger in town.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC
Associate Broker | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

desciption: With over 10 years of Real Estate experience and having placed keys in the hands of nearly 2000 clients, Addi is no novice when it comes to homes in the DMV. Being a DC native and enthusiast, she prides herself on having a wealth of market knowledge about the area, coupled with the luxury of having seen the city evolve over time. Addi has an ability for simplifying the real estate process and customizing each client's experience to fit their wants and needs seamlessly. Addi earned her Bachelor of Degree in Business Management from Hampton University in 2010, which lends tremendously to her ability to negotiate and market for her clients. In her free time, Addi enjoys traveling, playing with her dogs Missy and Hazel, working out and spending quality time with her close friends and family.

desciption: Through his comprehensive and intimate knowledge of the Greater DC real estate market, Reza Akhavan provides valuable insights to his clients.  Known as the “The Go to Agent” for one of his favorite neighborhoods and where he resides is the community of Petworth. Appreciated for his extra effort and attention that produces outstanding results, Reza constantly takes every measure to ensure that his clients successfully accomplish their personal real estate goals.   As a specialist in the Acquisition and  of Residential Properties and Rentals in all price points; Reza offers exceptional representation and ensures that each client is provided with the expertise that meets their personal objectives. His main goal is to help each client make educated choices about their investments and takes great care to advise his clients with valuable analytical information and an informed and comprehensive understanding of the current real estate market.  He delivers impressive results  knowing the important questions to ask upfront.  His clients know him to be genuine, honest and full of integrity.  In taking every measure to help his clients successfully find the home that they will fully cherish, he is very skilled in finding solutions that result in a positive outcome.   Going above and beyond is all part of Reza’s special care and attention that makes all the elements come perfectly together.  He is always extremely attentive, accessible and responds promptly. His attention to detail, consistent follow through and determination to indulge his clients with first class service sets his apart.  Reza ultimately ensures that each client receives an exceptional real estate experience and takes every measure to accomplish their real estate goals.   Contact Reza to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Realtor®

desciption: Sherif Abdalla was born and raised in Northern Virginia where he attended Langley High School and then James Madison University, where he graduated with a degree in Computer Information Systems. After college, Sherif returned to the DC area to work in software sales before entering the restaurant business, where he successfully owned and managed six restaurants and nightlife venues over the course of ten years. It was through this experience that he learned the importance of building relationships and providing unrivaled customer service - skills that he leverages day in and day out for his clients as their Realtor today. Sherif knows that the decision to buy or sell is never an easy one, and feels honored to be part of such a significant milestone in his clients' lives. Throughout his real estate career he has worked with a variety of clients including, high-profile CEO's and local professional athletes, and has closed multi-million dollar transactions. In his spare time, Sherif is an avid DC sports fan with season tickets to the Wizards and Caps. He also coached in the Langley High School basketball program and enjoys participating in pick-up leagues in the area.
title: Executive Vice President | Member - Compass Sports & Entertainment Division

desciption: The 2 Rivers Team, inspired by the Potomac and Anacostia, which run through the 3 jurisdictions in the DMV, represents clients from every walk of life and every stage of living. Their extensive and deep local knowledge of the real estate market combined with a high-touch and hands-on work style is laser-focused on not just earning, but sustaining the trust of every single client. And it’s working. 70% of their current business is from past client referrals. The 2 Rivers Team business model is built on a simple principle: offer a better value than their competitors with a people-first philosophy built on data-driven decision making. One way the team accomplishes this is by offering home staging services to their clients, free of charge.  From partnering with sellers to ensure they choose economically sensible home improvement projects that bear the highest ROI, to staging homes, to accompanying first-time buyers on marathon property tours, the 2 Rivers Team works tirelessly to represent every client’s individual needs and unique set of circumstances. Whether you are a first-time buyer, experienced seller, real estate developer, empty-nester, or looking to relocate in or out of the area, the 2 Rivers Team has the experience, network, and resources to serve any of your real estate needs.
title: 2 Rivers Team
